Title: Legion Go 2 official: Lenovo’s new flagship handheld costs $1,099 — and up
Description:
Lenovo’s Legion Go was a polarizing handheld gaming PC, and that won’t change as the company officially announces its successor today: the new Legion Go 2 is slightly bigger, heavier, and costs at least $400 more than the original.
But in many other ways, it …

Title: Google says 'Nano Banana' drove in over 10 million new users to its Gemini app
Description: Google celebrated achievements made by its Gemini app image editor, nano banana.

Title: Alleged Galaxy S26 dummy units leak, and the Edge might look like Apple
Description: A snapshot on X (formerly Twitter) showcased the alleged dummy units for Samsung's Galaxy S26 series.

Title: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7 benchmarked: Exynos 2500 still has a long way to go
Description:
Samsung chose to go with the Exynos 2500 on the Galaxy Z Flip 7 instead of the usual Qualcomm silicon.
While the platform is better than before, it still isn't quite as good as what Qualcomm and MediaTek have to offer these days.

Title: I went hands-on with Lenovo's new Yoga Tab and Idea Tab Plus — here's who they're for
Description: I tried the Lenovo Yoga Tab and Idea Tab Plus, two new Android tablets that aim to tackle the midrange creativity sector and the budget productivity market.

Title: Alogic Debuts $2,000 32-Inch 6K Display With Touch Support
Description:
Alogic today announced a 6K display that supports touch-based input, with the company saying that it's the world's first 6K touchscreen that's compatible with the Mac.
The Clarity 6K Touch with Fold Stand has a 32-inch 6K display with a touchscreen.
The …

Title: I'm Grindr's CEO. I skip breakfast thanks to Mounjaro, read with my kids, and can't imagine life not in 'founder mode'
Description:
Grindr CEO George Arison's average day starts with checking email and Slack, seeing his kids, and stretching.
Then, the meetings begin.

Title: 'Disappointed' Clark to miss rest of Fever season
Description: Fever star Caitlin Clark, who has been limited to just 13 games because of injuries and hasn't played since July 15, will miss the remainder of the WNBA season.

Title: 'He changed for the better of the game': How Jim Harbaugh has evolved as Chargers coach
Description: From San Francisco to Ann Arbor to Los Angeles, Jim Harbaugh's coaching style has changed through the years.

Title: At least 450 people taken into ICE custody at Hyundai plant in Georgia
Description: United States immigration authorities have arrested at least 450 people in a raid on a Hyundai manufacturing site in Georgia, federal officials confirmed Friday.

Title: AI and the Fight Between Democracy and Autocracy
Description: The AI researcher Gary Marcus says techno-fascism is already happening in the United States.

Title: South Koreans detained in ICE raid at Hyundai electric vehicle site in Georgia
Description: The raid has sparked an angry response from South Korea which called it an unjust infringement of people's rights.

Description:

Title: How Small, Easy Acts of Joy Improve Happiness and Well-Being
Description: A community science project finds that modest reminders to find joy in the day can have benefits that are on par with those of more ambitious well-being interventions
